org.openimaj.image.analyser

Interface PixelAnalyser<Q>

  • Type Parameters:
    Q - The type of pixel this processor can process
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Colorfulness

    public interface PixelAnalyser<Q>
    An interface for objects that are able to analyse individual pixels.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void analysePixel(Q pixel)
      Analyse the given pixel.
      void reset()
      Reset the PixelAnalyser.

    • Method Detail

      • analysePixel

        void analysePixel(Q pixel)
        Analyse the given pixel.
        Parameters:
        pixel - The pixel to analyse.

      • reset

        void reset()
        Reset the PixelAnalyser. Called every time a new image is analysed in Image.analyseWith(PixelAnalyser) and Image.analyseWithMasked(org.openimaj.image.FImage, PixelAnalyser) .
